abstract: Vanessa Friedman examines singer Lady Gaga's striking transformation from fashion provocateur to wearer of couture; submits Gaga may still be making transgressive statement by challenging dictum that celebrities must trump styles of others.

headline.print_headline: From Flank Steak to Saint Laurent
headline.main: Lady Gaga Defines a New Role: Fashion Enabler

snippet: On her 30th birthday, examining the pop star’s style trajectory: from flank steak to Saint Laurent in six years.
lead_paragraph: On her 30th birthday, examining the pop star’s style trajectory: from flank steak to Saint Laurent in six years.
